about_the_game:
The story takes place in an eastern fantasy world where humans, monsters, and immortals all live together. In this fairyland you can explore a breathtaking paradise with lush hills and crystal-clear waters alongside your daughter, enjoy playful monment in a bustling city, even lead her to make her way in the Jiang Hu underworld, seek out immortals, soar through the skies with a sword beneath her feet, and befriend mythical creatures from ancient legends. Under your guidance, a stunning and otherworldly fairyland awaits your daughter to experience! Every path is filled with unknown challenges and adventures, allowing her to grow and evolve in unique ways.

The fairyland is set in a living eastern fantasy world. In this world, besides planning your daughter's daily schedule, there are also many other ways to raise her, including trading, planting, cooking, fishing, playing cards, playing chess, dueling, refining medicine, practicing medicine, forging... Based on your preferences, you can make different choices and experience the consequent events.

In the fairyland, aloof from the world, you will steer the course of your daughter's destiny. Every decision shapes her future. Willi you guide her to become a courageous fighter with a sense of justice, always ready to help others? Or perhaps a doctor renowned for her superb medical skills and a desire to heal the world? She could also become a charming enchantress or a powerful dignitary. There are also hidden endings to explore. No matter which path you choose, every word and action will leave a lasting impact on your daughter's journey.

In the fairyland, your daughter is able to form romantic relationships with over 20 characters, each with a unique personality. Interacting with these characters not only increases their approval, but also offers various life experiences. For example, you can encourage daughter to date a high-born girl and live a life of luxury, or fall in love with a warrior and become embroiled in intense battles, or meet an immortal and experience extraordinary cultivation. What's more, a mysterious singer, drawn to the fairyland by its good reputation, will also provide your daughter an incredible experience... Each character is a story to be discovered, and their arrival will determine your daughter's romantic path.

When facing the enemies and obstacles on daughter's path of growth, there is not just one way to resolve them. In addition to allowing daughter to cultivate herself and use her divine weapon to "win people over with reason," she can also achieve a non-violent victory by learning the language of the demon race, making the enemy surrender without a fight, and so on... The unique and diverse outdoor explorations and multi-faceted battles make every journey daughter takes full of surprises and excitement!

As the number of game loops increases, more hidden elements will be unlocked. For example, a casual interaction from daughter during a holiday might attract someone's attention, and they will appear as a romanceable character in the next game loop. Digging deeper into suspicious clues may lead to different outcomes in the corresponding events of the next loop… More hidden content, including gameplay, characters, and storylines, awaits you and your daughter to discover together!

name: My Fairy Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 或更高
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: My Fairy Princess is a social simulation game with multiple endings, where you play the role of a father or mother to a young girl in the setting of an eastern fantasy world. Beneath the peaceful surface of this beautiful fairyland, contradictions and disputes have been quietly simmering.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
